column2: A standard-shaped ingot of dark purple metal, smelted from two pieces of ebony ore.
Go in search of the legendary sword of Chrysamer.
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] the founder of this bloodline, he was a great Duelist, the knowledge of how to fight properly is passed on to his descendant
Fulfill the ambition To see the prosperity of the country
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is founder of this family tree, he did everything for prosperity and preservation of peace within his country.
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] the founder of this pedigree, he possessed a phenominal talent in singing and playing the lute.
I need to show that living in peace and prosperity is normal, then people will remember me as a good person.
I need to explore a lot of places and find a lot of rare artifacts, then my name will go down in legends!
If I compose a lot of good works and practice enough, then people will never be able to forget me.
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] the founder of this bloodline, his stock of gold was very large, so much so that he is even now able to supply relatives with money.
I just need to raise enough money and people will remember me.
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] the founder of this bloodline, he was a just and noble ruler.
I need to be fair and noble if I want my vassals to remember me for centuries.
All the thieves of the world will be looking at my back, I intend to become the most legendary of all.
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] the founder of this pedigree, there is no person in the criminal world who does not know him.
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] the founder of this bloodline, his name still strikes fear into the hearts of people.
I need to perform a special ritual of replacing blood with magic, this will increase my life expectancy and mana reserve.
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] the founder of this bloodline, he performed a special ritual to replace blood with mana and now has a long lifespan, his ancestors carry part of his strength.
I need to use my magical powers to suspend the flow of time in me, I will deceive Akatosh himself!
If I create enough destruction with my magic, I will definitely be remembered.
This world should belong to the dead, I need to collect forbidden knowledge.
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] The founder of this bloodline, his battle magic could destroy cities.
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] The founder of this bloodline, his use of necromancy was very disastrous.
Prepare a grand ritual for your Daedric prince in the hope that he will allow you to stop being mortal and become a junior daedra.
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] The founder of this bloodline, with the help of a forbidden ritual and Daedra worship, he became the Small Daedra.
I need to collect the ingredients and perform a ritual to replace blood with mana.
I will gather my pack and become its leader!
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] The founder of this bloodline, he is one of the famous werewolf lords.
I need to create my own clan.
[This.GetFirstNameWithNick] The founder of this bloodline, he is one of the famous vampire lords.
This man has quite a strong blessing from Aedr, he breathes holiness from him.
Go in search of a unique weapon.
The Bloody Scythe is a unique scimitar that once belonged to the legendary Hacknir Seal of Death. The blade has a fellow Strangler.
The Strangler is a unique scimitar that once belonged to the legendary Hacknear Seal of Death. The blade has a brother Ч a Bloody Scythe

The Strangler is a unique scimitar that once belonged to the legendary Hacknear Seal of Death. The blade has a brother Ч a Bloody Scythe.
A one-handed glass sword and a semi-legendary artifact. It is extremely unusual in that the glass from which it is created is not green, but bluish, like young ice.
Go in search of unique artifacts.
I'm going to search for the unique artifacts of Tamriel.
Looking for a way to immortality
I have to find one of the sources of immortality, my skills will help me.

I am quite capable of stealing the formula of immortality from someone.
